name: Sunflower Solutions
overview:
Sunflower Solutions is a solar power company that provides the worldâ€™s lowest cost power solutions to the developing world.

For 1.6 billion people around the world, access to electricity is nonexistent. Without electricity clean water, medical care, education and economic development are nearly impossible to establish and maintain.

Sunflower provides the worldâ€™s only solar tracker for use in remote and developing areas. Called the emPower Plantâ„¢, these unique solar trackers allow people, even children, to adjust the direction of their solar array to increase energy production by an average of 30-35% versus traditional solar arrays. In addition, it reduces the overall cost of energy by an average of 30%.

Sunflower Solutions work with organizations and individuals interested in international aid. These include missionaries, church groups, non-profits, universities, NGOâ€™s, etc. Sunflower supplies these organizations with solar power to improve education, healthcare, clean water, economic growth, and agriculture.

The emPower Plantâ„¢ breaks down into a tightly packed kit to make shipping quick and easy anywhere in the world. Construction is also simple, requiring no training or technical expertise.
